title: Discz Music (YC W22) Is Hiring a Senior iOS Engineer
description:
# What’s the role?

As an early team member and engineer, you’ll not only be leading the development of our iOS App, but also contribute to key engineering decisions, weigh in on product strategy, and help shape our company culture. You’ll play a huge part in scaling our app to millions of users and change the way the next generation discovers music.

# Who are we looking for?

- Deep empathy for users and understands needs to drive product development in a way that best serves users and the business
- Experience building iOS apps for 3+ years
- Experienced in swift
- Willing to pick up new technologies (SwiftUI, etc.)
- Takes ownership and can work cross functionally with other engineers, product and design to drive product forward
- Able to scope out and execute on projects with little direction needed
- Value quality and taking the time to build clean, maintainable and scalable code
- Have a bias for action and using your skills to make an impact
- Have a passion for music
